Phoenix actually outpaced Phoenix visitors from the field by a 50 percent to 53 percent margin , and saw 0 of the 5 members of Phoenix 2 unit hit double digits in the scoring column . Richaun Holmes was playing through a broken nose that Richaun Holmes suffered in their 15 game and was wearing a protective mask . Josh Jackson just recorded 18 points and 3 assists in Sunday 's game against the Spurs , so Josh Jackson has been making Josh Jackson case for extended playing time . Tobias Harris finished with a game - high 33 points in 41 minutes . Danilo Gallinari led Los_Angeles in scoring and contributed 25 points , 6 rebounds and 2 assists on 11 - of - 12 shooting .
